Articles.Content: Hello, everyone! Im new here, though i've been playing since 0.18. I'm from a unknown place in Europe called Bulgaria. I like many games but favorites are ksp, terraria and minecraft(though it gets boring every 1-2 months). Im not really good at ksp especially because i'm really impatient. My best achievment yet is to land a rover on duna.
Hi Lichbane1401. If you can land a rover on Duna, you have the skills to do most things in the game. The rest is just practice.

Hello! I know Bulgaria is a Balkanic country donctha?

Alexander the great was from that piece of kerb... Sorry. Earth...

Welcome aboard Lichbane!

Alexander the great was from that piece of kerb... Sorry. Earth...

Not exactly. Bulgaria is further to the north than historical Macedonia (NOT the same as the "Republic of Macedonia" - which is actually north of where Macedon was...). which is where Alexander the Great came from.

Regards,

Northstar

Someone who knows the difference, finally!

Good job in history as well, Northstar1989. I'm a new member as well but I've been reading a lot of your posts before that.

And ofcourse.. welcome Lichbane1401
Hello and welcome, I'm also new to be here.
